Name: Small World Catering

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: As another reviewer pointed out,  it's not the cheapest place. However it was one of the tastiest sandwiches that I've ever had, in terms of flavours and the quality of the ingredients. The turkey was the best that I've ever had and not dry like it can be sometimes. It also had some peppers on, which again where incredibly tasty.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Very nice food! Healthy and fresh ingridients, delicious food and simple but yet still creative recipes. A great place to go for breakfast and/or lunch. I love the personal approach. Owners are always happy to chat with you, tell more about ‚Ä¶

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Amazing place with beautiful staff who would really go out of their way to make a customer happy. Food is just next level delicious,  and could easily cost more, compared to the quality. Vegetarian options available!

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Is there another place? Breakfast, lunch, brunch, dinner or sweets and pastries. Everything is top notch. The service by Sean and Clarence is the best

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Cozy and tiny place where you can enjoy cold and warm sandwiches or other nice food and soups. The English staff is very friendly and the portions are good! I really enjoyed the place as a great pit stop

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Fantastic find!!!! Friendly owner and staff. The sandwiches were amazing!!!!! Pastrami was delicious, but was slightly beat out by the Turkey Melt. Sooooo good!!!! Thank you Sean for your hospitality.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Great options for meat eaters and vegetarians. Good sized portions, really great combination of flavours. Detailed salad.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Most delicious sandwiches I have eaten in Amsterdam. I almost wish I had never been told about this place because once you‚Äôve eaten here you will crave it. Pastrami, turkey melt, and meat loaf sandwiches winners for me but everything we‚Äôve tried has been amazing.

Name: Small World Catering

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: An absolute MUST when visiting Amsterdam. The choice of delicious, fresh savory and sweet dishes here is gorgeous. Not to mention the super friendly staff. It is quite small but during nice weather there is also limited outdoor seating. Well worth a visit - highly recommended!

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Amsterdam‚Äôs best sandwiches. Hands down.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: We had chicken avocado ciabatta and the turkey melt... one of the best sandwiches I‚Äôve had in Amsterdam.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: The best food in Amsterdam. Wish I could teleport all the sandwiches to Melbourne. I think I still have dreams about these sandwiches! So delish! If you are in Amsterdam, please try. They are fantastic and the staff are all incredible as well!

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Absolutely the best sandwiches in all of Amsterdam (using great ingredients). Their carrot cake and cookies are scrumptious. Nice bonus: friendly staff who understand the importance of good sandwiches, salads, coffee, juices and snacks. ‚Ä¶

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: The Best eatery /  take away in town. Clarence is always smiling,, friendly,, handsome,, and fixes the best salades and sandwiches and cookies.. All fresh. And all staff is the best.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: This is my favourite place in the world for lunch! The food here is excellent and delicious. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Make sure you visit this place if you're in Amsterdam. Make sure you get there early for a seat at this cosy place or be prepared to get your food to go, either way you won't be disappointed.

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: I came here on my first trip to Amsterdam in 2011, and have returned many times since, with a year at least in between each set of visits, to a very warm hello. It's almost like visiting an old relative. The owner is so nice and he knows ‚Ä¶

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: I've been going here for over 8 years now! Amazing sandwiches and meals, and great sweets! I love their homemade chai! its has a very chilled and personal atmosphere, Sean and his team make you feel always like at home, even new people feel like they are regulars there. i love it!

Name: Small World Catering
Review Text: Amazing food. Great hospitality. Must go for sure!

Name: Small World Catering

Review Text: Super super super nice sandwiches. This is their specialty. I had a turkey melt with tabasco sauce on ciabatta and it was sensational. I would advise others to come and try the menu. Well done Small world!
